sentences.english: Since november ordinarily of it early stoped action.
sentences.chinese: 既然是十一月，他們早就該停止活動了。

sentences.english: Do yuo want to help your family save cash when times are tight ?
sentences.chinese: 既然經濟不景氣，想幫家裏節省開支嗎？

sentences.english: And while we’re talking about chores, the light in the basement burned out.
sentences.chinese: 既然在談家務事，地下室的燈泡燒壞了。

sentences.english: Hence, it is natural that some people are being investigated or questioned.
sentences.chinese: 既然是在調查，就需要對一些人進行調查和審訊。

sentences.english: What can they do since the children's parents were died.
sentences.chinese: 既然孩子們的父母雙亡，他們怎麼辦？

sentences.english: Because he himself suffered when he was tempted, he is able to help those who are being tempted.
sentences.chinese: 他自己既然被試探而受苦，就能撘救被試探的人。

sentences.english: I know my own strength, and I shall never be embarrassed again by his coming.
sentences.chinese: 這次我既然能夠應付，等他下次再來，我便不會發窘。

sentences.english: So, why not speak the truth?
sentences.chinese: 既然如此，爲什麼不說實話呢？

sentences.english: They bought the place they can do whatever they want to the ballroom right?
sentences.chinese: 中國人既然買了那個跳舞廳，想要幹什麼就能幹什麼。

sentences.english: But she had come this far, she wasn't going to back out now.
sentences.chinese: 不過既然大老遠跑來，絕不會此刻罷手。

sentences.english: In this case, prolongation of life should trump reproduction.
sentences.chinese: 既然這樣，延長壽命就要重於繁衍後代。

sentences.english: Why would you let your foot itch intolerably when you are able to scratch it?
sentences.chinese: 既然你可以騷騷癢，你爲什麼讓你的腳受瘙癢之苦呢？

sentences.english: Given that he's more prepared than I am, I suggest that he do the presentation.
sentences.chinese: 既然他比我準備更充份，我建議由他去做簡報。

sentences.english: So go out there and become great.
sentences.chinese: 既然如此，就去成爲一個更好的人吧。

sentences.english: Since my father was ill, my mother was naturally bound to be even more concerned about my affairs.
sentences.chinese: 父親既然病着，母親自然更該擔心我的事。

sentences.english: Seeing that she's old enough to get married, I don't think you can stop her.
sentences.chinese: 既然是女大當嫁，我認爲你也阻止不了她。

definition: to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
don't tell me .../could it be that...?
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
to be certain/to be positive/assuredly/definitely/to give recognition/to affirm/affirmative (answer)
anyway/in any case/to come over from the enemy's side
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
like that/in that way/or so/so/so very much/about/in that case
original/originally/at first/it goes without saying/of course
